summary: The diff appears to address the reported infinite update loop by adding guarded, ref-based initialization in `GameView.tsx` and by stabilizing `playBackgroundMusic` with `useCallback` in `useAudio.ts`. No clearly required items from REQ-28/29/30 are obviously missing based on the provided diff summary, but the audio changes introduce additional state/persistence behavior not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a persisted Zustand audio settings store (volume/mute) as part of the audio hook, which goes beyond stabilizing function identity for playback.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-30 asks to stabilize effect dependencies/function identities to avoid re-running initialization; it does not request adding/persisting audio settings state.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new console logging for audio autoplay-blocked and audio init/pause warnings.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-28/29/30; while not user-facing UI text, it is additional behavior beyond the specified fix.
